meanings.definition: To surpass in shining or brightness.
meanings.sent1: The sun was outshining all the stars in the sky.
meanings.sent2: Her smile was outshining the glow of the streetlights.
meanings.sent3: The flashlight was outshining the firefly's light, making it jealous.
meanings.sent4: The diamond was outshining all the other gems in the jewelry store.
meanings.sent5: The lighthouse was outshining the full moon, guiding ships safely to shore.

meanings.definition: To surpass in excellence or achievement.
meanings.sent1: His hard work was outshining all his classmates' efforts.
meanings.sent2: The team's performance was outshining their previous record.
meanings.sent3: The student was outshining the teacher in solving the math problem.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was outshining any award she could receive.
meanings.sent5: The artist's masterpiece was outshining all other paintings in the gallery.
